qas.question: What will be the importance of the pharmacist in coming decades?

answers.text: expected to become more integral within the health care system

qas.question: What is included in Medication Therapy Management?

answers.text: clinical services that pharmacists can provide for their patients

qas.question: What are examples of clinical services that pharmacists can provide?

answers.text: thorough analysis of all medication (prescription, non-prescription, and herbals) currently being taken by an individual

the thorough analysis of all medication (prescription, non-prescription, and herbals) currently being taken by an individual

qas.question: What are outcomes expected with Medication Therapy Management?

answers.text: a reconciliation of medication and patient education resulting in increased patient health outcomes and decreased costs to the health care system
